response.overview: Hands-on, engaging, and educational, Activity TV is interactive adventure for kids of all ages! Help your child make crafts, conduct experiments, and more with easy-to-follow tutorials led by friendly experts. For beginning to advanced levels, Activity TV guides you from step one - simply push play, grab your materials, and get started! CARTOONING FOR THE INTERMEDIATE Draw along with cartoonist Bruce Blitz as he shows you how to create awesome cartoon characters. For intermediate-level artists, these easy tutorials teach you how to draw fun people, like Joe the Pirate, Smiling Grandpa, and even broccoli with attitude! DRAWING LESSONS: Cats; Man with a Broken Heart; Steamed Broccoli Cartoon; Face Numbers; Smiling Grandpa; Ape Shapes; Joe the Pirate; Blood Hound Cartoon; Number 6 Toon
response.title: Activity TV: Cartooning Intermediate
